name: workinsight-chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension for WorkInsight data collection
author: WorkInsight Team

scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp popup.html dist/ && cp popup.css dist/ && cp privacy.html dist/ && cp terms.html dist/ && cp env.json dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
